phases.title: Phase 1: Foundations (Months 1-3)
phases.description: Build a solid foundation in Java programming, data structures, and basic algorithms.

phases.title: Phase 2: Intermediate (Months 4-6)
phases.description: Build proficiency in graphs, trees, and introduce dynamic programming.

phases.title: Phase 3: Advanced (Months 7-9)
phases.description: Master advanced algorithms, dynamic programming, and system design fundamentals.

phases.title: Phase 4: Elite (Months 10-12)
phases.description: Prepare for top-tier contests and master system design principles.
